misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires error code 'MISSING_FIELDS' for missing required fields, but login route uses 'MISSING_CREDENTIALS' instead

Spec defines error format as { error: { code, message } }, but frontend pages access data.error directly instead of data.error.message to display error text, which would show '[object Object]' instead of the human-readable message
Spec requires displaying the actual logged-in user's name in the dashboard header, but implementation uses hardcoded mock data 'User' instead of fetching the real user information
